title: Welcome to the “Connecting the Dots” Challenge
description: What You Need to Build You must build a solution that: • Accepts a PDF file (up to 50 pages) • Extracts: o Title o Headings: H1, H2, H3 (with level and page number) • Outputs a valid JSON file in the format below: { "title": "Understanding AI", "outline": [ { "level": "H1", "text": "Introduction", "page": 1 }, { "level": "H2", "text": "What is AI A working Dockerfile 3 Challenge Theme: Connecting the Dots Through Docs Your Mission You're handed a PDF — but instead of simply reading it, you're tasked with making sense of it like a machine would.
